Ecash protocol built on Bitcoin. Check out https://cashu.me and get yourself a wallet to play around! There are faucets you can get some free ecash "nuts" which are 1:1 redeemable for sats
It's all text which is cool
You can text sats essentially
And it's a "push" of sats rather than a "pull" like on lightning. Hard for me to explain but maybe someone else can
